summary: This is an email chain regarding the organization of materials for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. It involves a request to save PDFs related to testifying witnesses and 3500 materials (likely referring to Jencks Act or discovery materials) on a shared drive.

events.title: Email coordination for Maxwell trial materials
events.description: Email exchange confirming that materials for testifying witnesses in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial are ready and requesting they be saved to a shared drive.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated June 20-21, 2021, related to the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
It references organizing 'testifying witness 3500' materials, likely Jencks Act or discovery documents, into specific folders on a shared drive.
All email addresses and most names are redacted, indicated by placeholders like '(USANYS) [Contractor]' and symbols.
The correspondence shows administrative coordination between parties involved in the Maxwell trial preparation.
